duties_responsibilities.duty: Work directly with clients to understand their business needs and identify technical requirements.
Build custom solutions to address client challenges using innovative and problem-solving skills.
Provide guidance and direction to clients, leveraging technical expertise to tackle complex problems.
Identify and translate client business requirements into technical deliverables.
Deliver technology solutions to clients across various industries.
Advise on strategy to align clients' current data landscape with their future-state data landscape.
Provide leadership and mentorship to junior team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
